Confirmation from the golf course staff: The expert's verdict mentions that staff at the golf course posted pictures on social media showing golfers playing while the fire raged nearby. This confirms the authenticity of the claim and provides additional evidence.
Eyewitness account from a golfer: The expert's verdict includes an account from one of the golfers in the photograph, describing the scene and the progression of the fire. This firsthand testimony adds further support to the claim.
Information about the fire: The expert's verdict mentions details about the fire, including its location and the damage it caused. This information helps establish the context and validity of the claim.
